resources.string:
Running an OS thats layered with customizable options, the Realme 6 Pro provides a host of connectivity options in terms of 3G, 4G, GPS, Wifi Bluetooth capabilities. With good battery life, and great hardware under the hood, this smartphone can handle processing of daily tasks easily.

The Smartphone is powered by a Snapdragon 720G Processor and 8 GB RAM by realme ensures that the phone runs smoothly even when given the most memory intensive applications and still shows no signs of lag with 128 GB internal storage.

The Phone comes with a large 4300mAh battery to support its 5 inch screen with HD IPS LCD Capacitive touchscreen display having 6.6 inch Full HD+ Display | 90 Hz Ultra Smooth Display.The screen is also protected by a durable Scratch Resistant glass.
